param.name: component01
param.label: Component (01)
param.query: SELECT CONCAT(name, CONCAT('||', CONCAT(link, CONCAT('||', admin_menu_img)))) as myval, name FROM #__components WHERE name != '' AND link != '' AND link != 'option=com_user' AND link != 'option=com_wrapper' ORDER BY name
